name: Moero!! Judo Warriors
overview: Showing competitors in an international judo tournament, the players must travel around the world in search of judo opponents. The player even gets to compete in the Summer Olympic Games under his discipline of judo after defeating five opponents. Nine opponents must be defeated in the Olympic Games in order to collect the gold medal. It is also possible to customize our fighter since we can choose what attributes we want to improve as we win battles. Losing some matches while winning other may result in the awarding of either the silver or the bronze medal.
